statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders WHERE supplier_name = 'SupplierA';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM orders ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, supplier_name FROM orders WHERE product_name LIKE '%Apple%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, order_id DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, supplier_name FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING average_quantity > 50 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_location;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-05-16' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS order_count, supplier_id FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING order_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) as num_orders FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY num_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM Products p INNER JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_products FROM Suppliers s INNER JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name HAVING number_of_products > 5 ORDER BY number_of_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_id FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_id FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 5 AND supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%';

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 100 ORDER BY orders.quantity ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.order_id LEFT JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%');
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Suppliers ON Orders.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE Orders.quantity >= 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, order_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
